turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Good day. Please I want to offer a coffee drink. I need guide to offering a coffee drink, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just a normal coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: from what store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From Starbucks and in special packages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What ranges do you have available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there are lattes, capuccinos and espressos.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I will prefer espressos.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The medium size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, a tall espresso. any milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need milk without sugar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I need you to add honey to the coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so a tall espresso with whole milk, honey and no sugar. where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Where is the closest Starbucks to me? I'm right here in New York.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pick up at the starbucks in new york city.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, are you sure you added honey to the other?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, a tall espresso, whole milk, honey and no sugar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Exactly what I need.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: So you can place the order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great then! your coffee will be ready for pickup soon!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome! bye.
